Comment: He campaigned in all three elections like he was a 'heel' in professional wrestling.  Essentially you go out and explain a bunch of grievances that are mostly lies but are sprinkled with a hint of truth. Then the 'face' comes along and tries to explain how the heel is wrong but has to admit that he is a little bit right. But by then it doesn't matter as the heel is onto his next set of grievances.  Ultimately it gives the impression that the heel knows what he's talking about as he says his thing with confidence and the face is always stumbling along playing catch up. The content of what is said doesn't matter at all. It's all about non-verbal language.
